query: Could you propose a 5-day travel itinerary for a group of 7, commencing from St. Louis and intending to explore two cities in Texas from March 3rd to March 7th, 2022? Our budget is now set at $13,300. It is essential that our accommodations are suitable for children under 10. We are especially fond of Mediterranean, Indian, Mexican, and French cuisines, and we would prefer not to self-drive during our trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[San Antonio,Austin]
